column4: Ok, should I use GRUB or the Vista bootloader in my MBR? I have managed to get both set up to boot all 3 of my operating systems: Vista, XP, and Ubuntu
Are there any advantages to GRUB over Vista or vice versa?
you can get ntldr to boot linux? or is the vista one different?
thanks for the tip i'll go googling  -can i pm you with an off topic?
